title: Modulation of Adult Leydig Cell Function Subsequent to Glucocorticoid Activation

aop_mies.event: Stimulation of adult Leydig cells via the Adrenal Corticosterone, Increased Glucocorticoid

aop_kes.event: Apoptosis of adult Leydig cells, Decreased testosterone by adult Leydig cells
Glucocorticoid Receptor mediated alterations in steriodogenic enzymes, Decreased testosterone by adult Leydig cells
Direct effects of Corticosterone on steroidogenesis, Decreased testosterone by adult Leydig cells

aop_aos.event: Decreased sperm quantity or quality in the adult, Decreased fertility
